_comment: OpenClaw cron jobs - run via system cron until native support

jobs.name: compact-audits
jobs.description: Nightly audit log compaction (3 AM CST)

jobs.name: openclaw-health-check
jobs.command: cd ~ && export OPENCLAW_GATEWAY_TOKEN=\$(bun -e 'const t=await Bun.secrets.get({service:"com.openclaw.gateway",name:"gateway_token"});console.log(t)') && curl -s http://127.0.0.1:18789/health > /dev/null || openclaw gateway --port 18789 &
